question: The Minimum Alternative Tax (MAT) was introduced in the Budget of the Government of India for in which of the following years?
explanation: In order to bring such companies under the I-T network, Section 115JA was introduced from assessment year 1996-97. Now, all companies that record a book profit shall have to pay a minimum alternate tax @18.5% (plus surcharge and cess as applicable) under the Companies Act.
